timeline.bodyText:
The message is too much specific to a model.
But you are right, to be able to use this feature, there is a setting to change in the alarm panel to enable the feature, this is the case even for a PowermaxPro.
timeline.author: lolodomo
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -155,6 +155,7 @@ In case it fails after all the retries, you still have the option to later trigg
 -   Visonic does not provide a specification of the RS232 protocol and, thus, use this binding at your own risk.
 -   The binding is not able to arm/disarm a particular partition.
 -   The compatibility of the binding with the Powermaster alarm panel series is probably only partial.
+-   In order to be able to bypass zones, `Bypass` parameter at `Panel parameters` at PowerMax must be set to `manual bypass` as described in section 4.4.8 in installer's manual (Installer mode -> 4. Define Panel -> 8. Bypass).

replies.bodyText: I propose something like "In order to be able to bypass zones, you must first enable this feature by updating your panel configuration. Look at your installer's manual."
